reviews.review: jogo muito bom !!!!
Um bom jogo em ambiente de 2ºGuerra Mundial. Jogo bastante fluído. Recomendo.

I discovered the first Day of Defeat by accident while browsing the old steam client with my best friend many years ago. We tried it out and got hooked instantly! We were always more interested in historical shooters, moreso than Counter Strike. 

When this bad boy was bundled with the CS: Source disc, we greedily ran to the nearest outlet and bought one set each.

Over 10 years later, and we're still playing! Not as much as we used to, but we still pop on to play good old dod_avalanche! This game has brought me many hours of frustration, mastery and fun! It really stands the test of time, and still plays great on all systems I've ran it on. It's on sale now, and worth every penny! I mean, they're practically giving away this gem!

Highly recommend this game.

One of those I just keep getting back to for some high action WW2 fighting. 
Got some nice and joyful classes, not totally balanced but good enough for casual gameplay.

These days you'll run into a lot of good ol' players but the community is fine. Be sure to check what servers you join and you'll enjoy your time.

Un bon vieux jeu de tir à l'ancienne, qui est fait pour bourriner et le fait bien. L'équilibrage des maps et armes est sympathique, la prise en main est relativement rapide comparée à d'autres jeux du genre. C'est un jeu auquel j'aime retourner jouer un peu de temps à autres, depuis plusieurs années.

The Second World War was a time of darkness for humanity, and it's sheer infamy is still remembered 70 years later, and surviving the war was just as atrocious as dying. But this game can make it fun. This is so high quality, that its bieng nominated for the Steam Awards. This game kept me on the edge of my seat, and it is so addictive. Despite age, i would STILL buy this instead of Call of Duty or all those *other* shooters. This game is thrilling, addictive and relies mostly on your sense of skill, rather than waiting for someone to come blast you with a laser pointer that somehow heals you. This is a classic and amazing game.

Great fun for anyone with a shitty computer.

The classic Day of Defeat we all know and love now in Source! A ww2 FPS that you will have fun with for hours.
If you have the money it's worth it. Noticed though that there are a lot of older people playing this game probably like in their 50's and up. Most are pretty cool though...

This is my all time favorite shooter, bar none. Great physics, great motion and speeds, perfect balance of team forces and great objective based map layouts. This game also has a very vibrant community still after all these years, many custom maps and custom map servers as well as active realism clans still playing! Definitely worth the buy!
best WWII tactical game ever.

One of the best World War II games I have ever played, if you like fast paced games and counter strike games as well as source games this is the game for you, AND if you are a fanatic for World War II this is the game for you, although some of the communities may be toxic, I would suggest 6th Rangers, they are chill and have a really great DoD:S server.

2012年12月24日  Day of Defeat: Source    购买   支付宝   $4.99 USD 

本人在steam上购买的第二款游戏（第一款是骑砍大包）。如果骑砍大包是信仰充值，这个就是真真正正的为了玩而买的第一款游戏。
记得我还是初三时那时网吧还是1块一小时网吧老板装了dods的盗版，好像是起源研究所吧，那时网吧这游戏火的一比，我也是第一次看到这种一枪就死的fps，那时感觉这就是真实，cs什么的太虚幻了，然后就沉迷这个游戏了，然后又流行僵尸插件，是我第一次接触少数人当僵尸追杀多数普通人这种模式。还记得那时都是一堆人躲在一个房子里把各种家具打的堵住路口。然后那个网吧老板换人后游戏就没了，之后自己也搜索过这个游戏但是下载下来都是玩不了的。直到大学时开始玩骑砍，然后想玩骑砍多人，才知道steam这个平台，刚好圣诞节打折看到dods这个游戏马上激起了我少年时期的回忆，毫不犹豫的就买了。才买是还有几个国服有人，虽然吊打我这种很久没玩的菜鸡但是玩的还是很快乐，没事还去外服的僵尸打bot玩玩。但是毕竟是老游戏了，玩家人数可以肉眼看得见的减少，服务器数量也越来越少，后来我又转投了同题材的红色管弦乐队2，很长时间没上这个游戏了，最近偶然打开着游戏，发现服务器基本都是0/30，点最多人数也没有满人的服务器了，不禁有感而发写了这篇评论。

ÁN basic game on II. WW combat simulator. Impressive gameplay, colorized mechanic, Good feel during mass plays. Good community, tons of fan maps, well worked onriginal ground force feeling. If u like relive the WW 2 and get trough with your well working company, feel free and make some dummY crazy battle nights.

Excelente jogo, meu multiplayer preferido da VALVe junto com TF2. Gameplay, mapas, ambientação e comunidade muito bons, pena que não é tão jogado como CS, por exemplo, mas sempre tem um bom servidor disponível.
Simplemente divertido, un counter strike basado en la 2° guerra mundial. Tiene tiempo ya, pero todavía tiene vida este juego. Aunque para los tiempos que corren hay mejores opciones multijugador...
